item.title: Trio of dairy giants recall infant formula over contamination fears
item.description: Nestle, Danone and Lactalis recalled infant formula in several countries over the possible contamination of cereulide, which can cause nausea and vomi...

item.title: Effort to rein in Wall Street landlords could push US home prices up, investors say
item.description: Trump's housing policy restricts Wall Street home purchases, but investors warn it could backfire and drive prices higher by boosting demand in the ma...

item.title: GameStop shuttering 30 New York locations as part of nationwide closures linked to falling sales
item.description: GameStop is expected to close doors of around 30 New York locations as part of massive nationwide shutdown affecting 470 stores by the month's end.

item.title: Washington's proposed millionaire tax sparks concerns of broader levy, 'damage' to state's economy
item.description: Washington state GOP Chair Jim Walsh opposes the proposed millionaire tax, saying "nobody wants it" and warns that it could lead to broader income tax...

item.title: Airlines have 580 million reasons to like GLP-1 weight-loss drugs, analysis finds
item.description: U.S. airline companies stand to save hundreds of millions each year from Americans losing weight thanks to GLP-1 drugs, according to a new study.
